Basic tasks
These page describes basic tasks ( for full list of available tasks use command: usidk-build --list-tasks
Notice:
all usage examples are for global installation only!
task have to be attached to phase in order to run!
Concat
Used to concatenate files.
Accepts two objects:
"files" (array of Strings representing path to files that need to be concatenated)
"target" (String representing path to target file)
Example:
"concat": { "files" : [ "src/1.txt", "src/2.txt" ], "target" : "target/1and2.txt" }
Copy
Copies file to destination folder
Accepts two objects:
"from" (array of Strings representing paths to files that need to be copied)
"to" (String representing path to output folder)
Example:
"copy": { "from" : [ "src/x.html", "src/y.html" ], "to" : "target/" }
Delete
Deletes file or folder and containing files
Example:
"delete": { "target": "target/" }
Execute
Executes command along with arguments/attributes
Example:
"execute": { "command": "tools/tool.exe", "attributes": [ "-version", "-silent" ] }
